analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xec1cad815b5e8f0f86bb8fb2add2774886e79cf0.sol:
	Contract FreeCryptoLotto has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xec1cad815b5e8f0f86bb8fb2add2774886e79cf0.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xec1cad815b5e8f0f86bb8fb2add2774886e79cf0.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
